person.bio: It is only on maps that borders exist between humans. We are one world, one race, we carry one song. Dimitrios is the founder of The Music Medicine, a project committed to cultivating Global Joy & Harmony, through the use and study of Music and Performing Arts as tools of Human Development and Self-Healing. Medical Ethnomusicologist, Music Therapist, Musician, Listener and Conductor, Dimitrios has a more than three-decade experience in the arts of Music and Celebration, studying their beneficial effects in Mind, Body, Soul and Social interaction.
person.excerpt: Founder of The Music Medicine, a project committed to cultivating Global Joy & Harmony.
